definition: lips sealed and not saying anything (idiom); fig. to omit mention (of a non-person or embarrassing topic)/to censor
to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
(negative prefix)/not/no
to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid

sentences.english: The best thing is not to speak about that anymore.
sentences.chinese: 最好的方式就是絕口不提此事。

sentences.english: Avoid the drama and gossip and keep your salary to yourself.
sentences.chinese: 避免流言的最好方法就是絕口不提。

sentences.english: Solo longed to learn more about his parents, but Shrike kept all information from him.
sentences.chinese: 漢很想知道父母的情況，但什賴克總對他絕口不提。

sentences.english: Yet for more than 80 years he never spoke about the war.
sentences.chinese: 然而，80多年來他都對戰爭絕口不提。

sentences.english: Julie has been tight-lipped about her marital problems.
sentences.chinese: 茱莉一向絕口不提她的婚姻問題。

definition: the moth flies into the flame/fatal attraction
to spit on and curse/to revile
to make friends again/to renew old cordial relations
lit. one body two sides (idiom)/fig. a situation with two sides to it
to force someone to do something
gongs and drums overture to a Chinese opera/to create a disturbance
indecisive/wavering
lit. wading in mud and water/a slovenly job/sloppy
to suffer defeat in every battle (idiom)
cheerful/happy
spilt water is difficult to retrieve (idiom)/it's no use crying over spilt milk/what's done is done and can't be reversed/the damage is done/once divorced, there's no reuniting
lit. cannot rest or eat in peace (idiom)/fig. extremely worried and troubled
the person who shares your bed/partner/spouse
to go into a huff
wordless and silent (idiom); without speaking/taciturn
loath to part (idiom); emotionally close and unwilling to separate
